let me read all

[/quote]
Fix the images,
I see your point in all your project. I would make you some suggestions. First all names here are almost “-X”. I never seen 100%(100% means “Saving” “Loot share” “Ranks”)
Its looks pretty empty, Try add something unique that no one has. If you need any help on custom maps or any programming needs, feel free to contact me.
Good Luck.

Edit: Why having 4 Client developer? (its too much.)
I will join but please note so i am on my own project. I will still work on this but my main high priority is Certius.

Name: Artem Batutin
Ingame Name: Xion
Msn: artem5432@hotmail.com (Not using much)
Skype: artem5432
Experience: Allot Will send my skype
Age: 15
Apply For: Mainly Client, But i can code all.[/quote]

oke thnx for the tips i will use this tips and make it uniqeu

thank you
